common_env_variables.name: HEXAGON_TOOLS_PREFIX
common_env_variables.description: The path to the Hexagon tools. For example, /path/to/HEXAGON_Tools/8.7.04

common_env_variables.name: HEXAGON_SDK_PREFIX
common_env_variables.description: The path to the Hexagon SDK. For example, /path/to/Hexagon_SDK/6.0.0.2

common_env_variables.name: CHRE_TARGET_ELF_READER
common_env_variables.description: The path to the elf reader provided by the toolchain

env_variables.name: ANDROID_BUILD_TOP
env_variables.description: The path to the root of the Android source tree.

env_variables.name: NANOPB_PREFIX
env_variables.description: The path to the nanopb installation.

env_variables.name: QSH_BRANCH
env_variables.description:
The branch of the QSH repository to use.
The available branches can be found at https://partner-android.googlesource.com/platform/vendor/google_partners/qcom-chre

env_variables.name: QSH_PREFIX
env_variables.description: The path to the QSH repository checkout, which can be automatically created in the following step.

env_variables.name: SSC_PREFIX
env_variables.description:
The path to the SSC (Snapdragon Sensor Core) repository.
This path should point down to the adsp_proc folder

env_variables.name: CHRE_TARGET_EXTENSION
env_variables.description: The path to the makefile extension for the target.

env_variables.name: ANDROID_BUILD_TOP
env_variables.description: The path to the root of the Android source tree.

env_variables.name: NANOPB_PREFIX
env_variables.description: The path to the nanopb installation.

env_variables.name: QSH_BRANCH
env_variables.description:
The branch of the QSH repository to use.
The available branches can be found at https://partner-android.googlesource.com/platform/vendor/google_partners/qcom-chre

env_variables.name: SSC_PREFIX
env_variables.description: The path to the SSC (Snapdragon Sensor Core) repository. This path should point down to the adsp_proc folder.

env_variables.name: SLPI_PREFIX
env_variables.description: The path to the SLPI (Snapdragon Low Power Island) repository. Defaults to SSC_PREFIX.

env_variables.name: QSH_PREFIX
env_variables.description: The path to the QSH repository checkout, which can be automatically created in the following step.

env_variables.name: CHRE_VARIANT_MK_INCLUDES
env_variables.description: The path to the variant makefile to include.

common_env_variables.name: ANDROID_BUILD_TOP
common_env_variables.description: The path to the root of the Android source tree.

common_env_variables.name: RISCV_TOOLCHAIN_PATH
common_env_variables.description: The path to the RISC-V toolchain which should point down to a specific version, such as CodeLine_240

common_env_variables.name: CHRE_TARGET_ELF_READER
common_env_variables.description: The path to the elf reader provided by the toolchain

env_variables.name: NANOPB_PREFIX
env_variables.description: The path to the nanopb installation. Defaults to the one in the Android tree.

env_variables.name: TEST_SIGN_KEY
env_variables.description: The path to the key used for signing test nanoapps.

env_variables.name: RISCV_TINYSYS_PREFIX
env_variables.description: The path to the RISC-V Tinysys repository, which leads to the folder named 'tinysys'.

env_variables.name: CHRE_VARIANT_MK_INCLUDES
env_variables.description: The path to the variant makefile to include.
